text: @realDonaldTrump You risked thousands of lives so u could use 4th of July as a “Presidential Rally” spouting lies & mistruths. I wish Ill on NO PERSON, but I sure hope you manage to suffer with a BAD case of COVID19 like the rest of the USA. 💔
